response.overview: In Starfall, Brian Byun stars as a lone astronaut who embarks on a perilous mission to uncover the truth behind a mysterious cosmic event that has disrupted the fabric of space and time. As strange anomalies ripple through the galaxy, he must confront the remnants of a lost civilization, battle inner demons, and make impossible choices that will determine the fate of multiple worlds. Directed by Marcus Lee and produced by Anna Kim, Starfall is a visually stunning sci-fi epic that blends human drama with interstellar adventure â€” coming soon to theaters.
response.title: Starfall
